TopicTitle: Game freezes during assembling in VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi!

Please help. Game freezes during assembling craft in VAB. Music keeps playing, I even can hear mous clicks, but nothing else happens, then after a couple of minutes game crushes.

I know, there is couple of mods not up to date, but as I know, other players have no problem with it...

Thanks in advance!

KSP: 1.12.3.3173 Windows 10 64 bit

Problem: Game freezes during assembling craft in VAB. 

Mods installed:

kSP_Expanded (4kSPExpanded 0.2.1.6)
ASET Agency (ASETAgency 1.0)
ASET Props (ASETProps 1.5)
B9 Part Switch (B9PartSwitch v2.19.0)
Breaking Ground (BreakingGround-DLC 1.7.1)
Chatterer (Chatterer 0.9.99)

Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 1.4.2)
DMagic Orbital Science (DMagicOrbitalScience 1.4.3)

Easy Vessel Switch (EVS) (EasyVesselSwitch 2.3)

Environmental Visual Enhancements Redux (EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 3:1.11.6.1)

Kerbal Reusability Expansion (SpaceXLegs 2.9.2)
Making History (MakingHistory-DLC 1.12.1)
MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.12.3.0)
ModularFlightIntegrator (ModularFlightIntegrator 1.2.10.0)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 4.2.1)
Navball Docking Alignment Indicator CE-2 (NavballDockAlignIndCE 1.1.1.1)
RasterPropMonitor (RasterPropMonitor 1:v0.31.6)
RasterPropMonitor Core (RasterPropMonitor-Core 1:v0.31.6)
RecoveryController (RecoveryController 0.0.4.1)
ScienceAlert ReAlerted (ScienceAlert 1.9.10)
Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux (StationPartsExpansionRedux 2.0.6)

Trajectories (Trajectories v2.4.3)
TriggerAu Flags (TriggerAu-Flags v2.10.0.0)
Universal Storage II Finalized (UniversalStorage2 4.0.0.3)
Zero MiniAVC (ZeroMiniAVC 1:1.1.2.4)

Reproduction steps:

Build a craft in VAB. 

Log:

Player.log

 KSP.log

At first glance of your player log, MechJeb is throwing a lot of null reference exceptions .  also seeing a lot of texture errors. Hard to say, but looks like a blown mod install, or incorrect installation location.  A look at your gamedata folder might be helpful.

I would look at your MechJeb installation first.  There are a lot of errors in the Log, so a serious look at your mod installs would be in order.
